name: CLM_VALUES_4
description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record. The CLM_VALUES_4 table holds claim-level values set by the system during claims processing or by user edits.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim value record.

columns.name: REP_CLM_NUM
columns.description: The repriced claim reference number.

columns.name: ADJ_REP_CLM_NUM
columns.description: The adjusted repriced claim number.

columns.name: CLM_TRANS_INTMD
columns.description: The identifier for claim transmission intermediaries.

columns.name: CLM_PRO_APP_NUM
columns.description: The Peer Review Organization (PRO) Approval Number for the claim.

columns.name: CLM_PRICING_METHDLG
columns.description: The claim pricing methodology.

columns.name: CLM_REP_ALWD_AMT
columns.description: The claim re-pricing allowed amount.

columns.name: CLM_REP_SVNG_AMT
columns.description: The claim Repriced Saving Amount.

columns.name: CLM_REP_ORGID
columns.description: The Repricing Organization Identifier for the claim.

columns.name: REP_PDIEM_FLTRT_AMT
columns.description: The Repricing Per Diem or Flat Rate Amount for the claim.

columns.name: REP_APRVD_DRG_CODE
columns.description: The Repriced Approved Diagnosis Related Group Code for the claim.

columns.name: REP_APPRVD_AMT
columns.description: The Repriced Approved Amount for the claim.

columns.name: REP_APRVD_REV_CODE
columns.description: The Repriced Approved Revenue Code for the claim.

columns.name: REP_ASU_MSRMNT_CODE
columns.description: The basis of measurement (e.g., Days, Units) for Repriced Approved Service Unit Count.

columns.name: REP_APR_SERV_CNT
columns.description: The Repriced Approved Service Unit Count for the claim.

columns.name: PAYTO_PLAN_TAXID
columns.description: The Pay-To Plan Tax Identification Number.

columns.name: FIRST_CNCT_DT
columns.description: The Property and Casualty Date of First Contact.

columns.name: REPRICER_RECVD_DT
columns.description: The Repricer Received Date.

columns.name: MCARE_XOVER_IND
columns.description: The Mandatory Medicare Crossover Indicator.

columns.name: CARE_PLN_NUM
columns.description: The Care Plan Oversight Number.

columns.name: HOMEBOUND_COND_QUAL
columns.description: The Homebound Condition Qualifier.

columns.name: HOMEBOUND_COND_CD
columns.description: The Homebound Condition Code.

columns.name: DENTAL_SVC_FROM_DT
columns.description: The Dental Service From Date. It will only be populated when using a dental form.

columns.name: DENTAL_SVC_TO_DT
columns.description: The Dental Service To Date. It will only be populated when using a dental form.

columns.name: DENTAL_SVC_DT_QUAL
columns.description: The dental date range qualifier. It will only be populated on a dental form.

columns.name: ORTHO_TREAT_IND
columns.description: The Orthodontic Treatment Indicator. This column will only have data when a dental claim has orthodontic services without any months of orthodontic treatment being reported.

columns.name: DENT_PREDET_CODE
columns.description: The code identifying whether a claim is a pre-authorization dental claim. If the claim is a predetermination of benefits claim (pre-auth), this column will be populated with "PB".  If the claim is a statement of actual services, this column will be null.

columns.name: OTH_ACC_EMER_YN
columns.description: The indicator that the claim includes emergency services.

columns.name: STER_ABOR_YN
columns.description: The indicator that a visit was related to a sterilization or abortion.

columns.name: PAYEE_NUM
columns.description: The payee number for Medicaid.

columns.name: CLM_LVL_TOS
columns.description: The claim-level type of service code.

columns.name: CLM_LVL_EPSDT_YN
columns.description: The indicator that the claim was related to an Early and Periodic Screening, Diagnostic, and Treatment (EPSDT) visit.

columns.name: CLM_LVL_FAM_PLAN_YN
columns.description: The indicator that the claim was related to family planning.

columns.name: CLM_LVL_EMER_YN
columns.description: The indicator that the claim was related to emergency services.

columns.name: PAT_LOCATION_IDENT
columns.description: The county code corresponding to the patient address.

columns.name: PAT_PERSONAL_IDENT
columns.description: The combination of patient name characters and digits from their SSN used by the Statewide Planning and Research Cooperative System (SPARCS) to identify the patient.

columns.name: DRG_SOI
columns.description: The Severity Of Illness (SOI) of Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) determined for the claim.

columns.name: DRG_ROM
columns.description: The Risk Of Mortality (ROM) of Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) determined for the claim.

columns.name: CAS_SVC_POS_NUM
columns.description: The position number within the service line in the source claim CEV.

columns.name: CLM_RECORD_INDICATOR
columns.description: The action to be taken on the claim.

columns.name: LINE_OF_BUSINESS_CODE
columns.description: The line of business (LOB) code under which claim was paid.

columns.name: BENEFIT_ID
columns.description: The identifier for a set of parameters, benefits, or coverage criteria used to adjudicate a claim.

columns.name: PLAN_TYPE
columns.description: The type of plan identifier.

columns.name: PRESC_PROV_TAXONOMY
columns.description: The prescribing provider taxonomy code.

columns.name: ADJUD_DATE
columns.description: The date the claim was processed.

columns.name: ADJUD_TM
columns.description: The time the claim was processed.

columns.name: REJECT_OVERRIDE_CODE
columns.description: The reason for paying a claim when override is used.

columns.name: CROSS_REF_ICN
columns.description: The ID associated with the original claim for adjustment claims.

columns.name: PAYMENT_CLARIFICATION_CODE
columns.description: The additional information on the status of the payment of the claim.

columns.name: ADJUSTMENT_TYPE
columns.description: The type of adjustment whether debit or credit.

columns.name: STER_ABOR_CODE
columns.description: The single-letter sterilization/abortion code appearing in field 22D on the eMedNY 150003 claim form

columns.name: POSSIBLE_DISABILITY_YN
columns.description: The indicator that the service was for treatment of a condition which appeared to be of a disabling nature for field 22F on the eMedNY 150003.

columns.name: PMT_SRC_MCR_INVOLVE
columns.description: The single-digit source code indicator that indicates Medicare's involvement in paying for these charges for field 23B box M on the eMedNY 150003 claim form.

columns.name: PMT_SRC_OTHR_INVOLV
columns.description: The single-digit code indicating whether the patient has a coverage besides Medicare and Medicaid for field 23B box O on the eMedNY 150003 claim form.

columns.name: PMT_SRC_INS_CODE
columns.description: The two-digit insurance code for the commercial coverage, if any, for field 23B box O on the eMedNY 150003 claim form.

columns.name: LOCATOR_CODE
columns.description: The locator code assigned by Medicaid for the address where the service was performed for field 25C on the eMedNY 150003 paper claim form.

columns.name: MEM_SUBMIT_PMT_RELEASE_DATE
columns.description: The date the member submitted claim became payable, which could differ from the check date.

columns.name: CHECK_DATE
columns.description: The claim check date.

columns.name: PAT_DEM_CODE_QUAL
columns.description: The patient demographic code qualifier.

columns.name: PAT_DEM_CODE
columns.description: The patient demographic code.

columns.name: DRG_CODE_SET
columns.description: The code set of the Diagnosis Related Group (e.g., APR-DRG, MS-DRG).

columns.name: CLM_STATUS
columns.description: The submitter's claim status (e.g., clean, denied).

columns.name: DRG_CODE_VERSION
columns.description: The version of the code set that the Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) code on the claim is associated with (e.g., Version 31, Version 32)

columns.name: IS_CLINICALLY_INVALID_IDENT
columns.description: The external identifier representing if the claim is clinically invalid or not.

columns.name: DRG_CODE_SET_IDENT
columns.description: The external identifier representing the Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) code set.

columns.name: DRG_CODE_VER_IDENT
columns.description: The external identifier representing the Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) version.
